title: Bug 49536 - No content returned when accessing URL in empty Tomcat 7 instance
description: When accessing a URL in a Tomcat 7 instance with no deployed webapps, a response with HTTP status code 200 OK is returned without any content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
OB: Accessing a URL in an empty Tomcat 7 instance returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: The expected behavior is for the server to return an HTTP error 404 when accessing a URL in a Tomcat 7 instance without any deployed webapps.
SR: Please modify the server behavior to return an HTTP error 404 when accessing a URL in a Tomcat 7 instance with no deployed webapps.
